name: dd_terminal
description: This project is a starting point for a Flutter application.

scripts.gen-assets: flutter packages pub run build_runner build
scripts.gen-assets-conflict: flutter packages pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs
scripts.clean: flutter clean && flutter pub get repair
scripts.build-ipa: npm run gen-assets-conflict && flutter build ipa --split-debug-info
scripts.apk-split: npm run gen-assets-conflict && flutter build apk --split-per-abi
scripts.apk-analyze: npm run gen-assets-conflict && flutter build apk --analyze-size --target-platform=android-arm64
scripts.ios-release-dev: flutter pub get && npm run gen-assets-conflict && cd ios && pod install && fastlane beta && cd ..
